title: 119: Bullies & Other Dumb-Asses
description: Sal, Adam & Justin take on the topic of bullies and whiney-assed, self-righteous people who focus on political correctness rather than on providing solutions to real problems.
content:encoded: Sal, Adam & Justin take on the topic of bullies and whiney-assed, self-righteous people who focus on political correctness rather than on providing solutions to real problems.
